Back to Felix Mendelssohn

Felix Mendelssohn

Lieder ohne Worte, Book 7, op. 85

1834–1845 · MWV U 101, 111, 155, 189–191

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP page 1] · [IMSLP page 2]

Total duration: 13'

  • 1. F major
  • 2. A minor
  • 3. E-flat major
  • 4. D major
  • 5. A major
  • 6. B-flat major

The pieces are spread over multiple entries in the Leipzig Edition catalogue.

no.MWV Uyear
11891844
21011834
31111835
41901845
51911845
61551841

Recommended editions

  • Bärenreiter · BA 9069 · Lieder ohne Worte · ed. R. Larry Todd [including two versions of no. 5]
  • Henle · HN 327 · Klavierwerke / Band III / Lieder ohne Worte · ed. Rudolf Elvers / Ernst Herttrich [including two versions of no. 6]
  • Könemann · K 316 · Lieder ohne Worte III · ed. István Máriássy [including two versions of nos. 1, 3–4 and 6, and three versions of no. 2]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50075 · Lieder ohne Worte · ed. Christa Jost

1. F major

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

2. A minor

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 3

3. E-flat major

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3

4. D major

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3

5. A major

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3

6. B-flat major

Mendelssohn also arranged this piece for piano duet.

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3.5
